bio: Hendrik Ebbers is the founder of Open Elements. He is a Java champion, a member of JSR expert groups and a JavaOne rockstar. Hendrik is a member of the Eclipse JakartaEE working group (WG) and the Eclipse Adoptium WG. In addition, Hendrik Ebbers is a member of the Board of Directors of the Eclipse Foundation.

Daniel Meyer is a software architect and developer with a passion for the web. He is a member of the Eclipse JakartaEE working group (WG) and the Eclipse Adoptium WG. Daniel is a member of the Board of Directors of the Eclipse Foundation.
